title: Sonic Geometry Explorer
description: An interactive tool that visualizes the relationship between geometry and sound, transforming mathematical patterns into both visual representations and corresponding audio.

fullDescription.content: Sonic Geometry Explorer is an interactive tool that visualizes the relationship between geometry and sound. It transforms mathematical patterns into both visual representations and corresponding audio, allowing users to explore the fascinating connections between these domains in real-time.
The application creates mesmerizing visual patterns that directly correspond to audio frequencies, harmonics, and rhythms, making abstract mathematical concepts tangible through both sight and sound.

items.title: Interactive Visualizations
items.content: Dynamic geometric patterns that respond to audio input and user interaction

items.title: Real-time Audio Synthesis
items.content: Generate sounds based on geometric relationships and mathematical principles

items.title: Parameter Controls
items.content: Adjust frequencies, harmonics, amplitudes, and visual elements with intuitive controls

items.title: Multiple Visualization Modes
items.content: Switch between 2D and 3D representations of sound patterns
